data.message: Implement S2 secret sink detection: Added PostToolUse hook scanning tool output for API keys, tokens, passwords. Detections logged to .claude/telemetry/*-s2-detections.jsonl. Warning message generated but may not surface in Claude Code UI. Discovered tool_response.stdout is correct field path. Renamed log file to avoid false positive from credentials-gate.
data.outcome: Added PostToolUse hook scanning tool output for API keys, tokens, passwords. Detections logged to .claude/telemetry/*-s2-detections.jsonl. Warning message generated but may not surface in Claude Code UI. Discovered tool_response.stdout is correct field path. Renamed log file to avoid false positive from credentials-gate.
